runs.comm: tight line on off, strides forward and dabs it to the covers
pitched further up and outside off, Balbirnie gets a big stride forward and drives it to mid-off
Tanwir pulls his length back on off, blocked to point off the face
fractionally short and outside off, Balbirnie deftly steers it to third man for one
back of a length and outside off, front-foot punch to mid-off
darted too full and on off, pushed back to Tanwir
bumpy short ball outside off, bounces extra and beats Balbirnie
cracker of a shot.. Room outside off, slapped over point, races away to the boundary off the middle of the bat
and again! Loose short ball outside off, he makes it look even worse by thrashing it in the gap at point again
much better from Amjad. On a goodish length and outside off, bunted to short cover
spilled at backward point, Chapman the culprit. Short and wide outside off, cut in the air to Chapman. Pops in and pops out. Should have been taken

caught at deep third man.. Balbirnie departs off the very next ball. Chapman owes Aizaz a drink tonight. Balbirnie steps away makes room and slashes hard, skying it to deep third man, where the fielder moves to his right, judges it and snaps it up at the edge of the boundary
good length and curls away with the angle, poke and a miss
good length and outside off, Porterfield watches it through to the keeper
fractionally short and outside off, Porterfield holds his shape well and punches it to the covers
full and on the stumps, Porterfield skips forward and leans into a drive but picks out cover
back of a length and outside off, Porterfield transfers his weight back and punches it between cover-point and the cover. Top placement and equally good timing
good length and on middle, defended from the crease to off
short and hurries on off, jabbed to the covers
Stirling makes room outside leg, the bowler follows him. Driven to the covers, can't hit the gap
slower ball on off, down the track. Stirling waits, waits and lofts it over the covers despite being beaten in flight, the ball trickles away to the boundary
down the track again, the bowler drags his length back. Yet, Stirling crunches it between mid-off and cover
Stirling makes room outside leg, follows the batsman. Clipped to the right of mid-on
Porterfield sits back in the crease and keeps this full ball out to off
shortish and outside off, pulls and misses
Stirling skips away outside leg, Tanwir follows him and suffocates him. Drives and does not connect
short and outside off, another jabbing punch to the covers
back of a length, top-of-off line. Stirling misses the pull and wears it high on his thigh/on the waistline. It would have trampolined over the stumps..
shortish and outside off, cracked to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, punched to the right of short cover. Diving save
what a strike.. Full and on off, Stirling extends his arms as he launches it straight down the ground. Clean and effective
back of a length and sits up outside off, flat-bat wallop to the right of mid-off. Muscular hit
Stirling goes away outside leg, Aizaz chases him and cramps him. Flicked to the right of mid-on
good length ball on off, Stirling employs finesse as he glides it to the left of short third man
back of a length and on middle, whisked through midwicket. They push on for a couple. Stirling collides with the keeper. Both are down
back of a length and on middle and leg, punchy drive to the right of mid-on
short ball on middle, Porterfield pulls in the air. It dies in front of Nizakat at deep square leg, despite the forward-dive
full and outside off, sliced to point
rides the bounce of this short ball and runs it to third man
back of a length and outside off, nice punchy drive to long-off
length and tailing away outside off, wafts and gets beaten
chopped to deep third man from an off-stump line
pushed through on off, chipped between the bowler and non-striker to long-on
straight ball on the pads, tucked through midwicket
flatter and on middle and leg, pushed in front of mid-on
deflected to short fine leg off the pads
back of a length and on middle, punched to long-on
full and strikes him on the pad as he misses the flick. It had pitched outside leg and the lbw appeal is turned down
short and outside off, chopped to backward point as he does not cut it from the middle of the bat

impressive running catch at deep midwicket. Irfan breaks the stand. Back of a length and outside off, Stirling does not control a pull. Miscues it in the air off a top edge, Nadeem runs forward and then to his left to pouch it
darted wide outside off, cut away to backward point
short and on the stumps, Porterfield rolls his wrists on the pull and plays it through backward square leg
fuller and on off, inches forward and works to midwicket
short ball on off, KOB gets behind the line and blunts it
wide line outside off, Porterfield flashes a cut to backward point
full and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
full and well outside off, cracked to deep cover
tossed up and on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket
slides on with the arm, chops it behind point
worked from middle and leg through midwicket
clipped off the hips in front of square
short and rises on middle, forced out to deep cover after getting on top of the bounce
good length ball on off, KOB lunges forward and pushes it back to the bowler
full and outside off, drills a drive to the covers
Irfan drops a return catch. Full and stops on the batsman, who chips it back to the bowler. The line is on off. Irfan leaps in his followthrough but can only parry it away
back of a length and outside off, steered to point
down the track and slammed to long-off. The fielder runs to his right, dives and stops the ball
sprayed wide outside off, strays in line

KOB is short of the crease at the non-strikers' end. On a length and outside off, crashed to long-off. Porterfield wants a couple. KOB, who was a bit slow/casual, has to pay the price. Accurate throw and Nizakat takes the bails off
straight in line, pushed back to the bowler
slapped out to deep cover
pokes and misses outside off
flicked to long-on for one
slides on outside off, left alone
floated on middle and leg, nudged to midwicket
darted flat, punched down to long-on
extra bounce on this flat one outside off, Wilson goes on the back foot and cuts it away to third man
short and on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
slider outside off, mistimed cut to backward point
slid through outside off, Porterfield can't connect with a cut
good length and on middle, driven back to the bowler
room outside off, cut away to deep cover
chipped off the pads over midwicket
back of a length and outside off, stroked through the covers
slides on the pads, Wilson misses the flick but this was slipping down leg
reverse-sweeps and misses. The keeper is beaten as well. They sneak a bye
full and straight, tucked through midwicket
Porterfield makes room and carves it away to sweeper cover for two
good length and on middle, Porterfield makes room and drives it inside out over the covers
pushed through outside off, Porterfield drops back and cuts it to deep cover
dances down the track and secures a single to the right of mid-off
dug in short and outside off, sits up to be smacked. Wilson skips back and cuts it firmly past backward point
back of a length and on middle, mis-hit pull to deep midwicket. Not middled
full toss on the pads, Porterfield misses out. He plays a powerless flick, it works in his favour as it does not carry to deep backward square leg
stump-to-stump line, steered to backward point. Porterfield wants a single but it sent back by Wilson
Wilson marches down the track, the bowler pulls his length back. Mistimed pull lands between deep midwicket and long-on
Wilson comes down the track again and puts off Aizaz, who slides down leg

Wilson has been strangled down the leg side. He shakes his head as he trudges back. Back of a length and sliding down leg again. Wilson folds low in the crease as he aims to lap-scoop it over short fine leg. He does not get hold of the stroke, gloves it behind to Atkinson, who accepts the catch with glee
back of a length and outside off. Porterfield, who had pre-meditated and made room, leaves
Porterfield advances down the track, the bowler drags his length back. Swings and misses
back of a length and outside off, slashed to deep cover
good length and shapes away outside off, he drives and misses
fractionally short and outside off, run down to deep third man with a healthy helping of cheek
back of a length and on middle, Poynter hangs back and pinches a single in front of the covers
darted down leg from round the stumps, wide called
hacked to long leg off an inside edge as this was a length ball on the leg stump
down the track and manufactures a full ball as Porterfield drives it to backward point
yorker, dug out for one

low full toss, powered down the ground to long-on. The fielder runs across to his left, slides, slips and is struck on the face. Nadeem Ahmed is down in pain. The physio is out to tend to him. This doesn't look good
The leg stump is splintered. Pin-point yorker from Amjad, it dips under the swinging bat and knocks out the leg stump. Big, big wicket for Hong Kong

Bye, bye Thompson. Hurled full and outside off, driven to extra cover and Thompson sets off for a speedy single. Afzal attacks the ball and throws the stumps down at the non-strikers' end. Tense faces in the Ireland camp
back of a length and outside off, chopped to point
full ball just a shade outside off, swings and misses

edged behind. Ireland are sliding quickly. Back of a length and jags in outside off. He loads up for a pull and can only under-edge it to Atkinson. The umpires check for a possible no-ball. Irfan's footing is fine and Poynter has to go.
back of a length and outside off, Dockrell throws his bat at it and does not connect
holes out to Hayat at long-on. Back of a length and on middle, Dockrell punts it straight down the gullet of the fielder. Make that four wickets in seven balls
back of a length and outside off, Mooney waits on it and steers it to third man
good start to the over for Ireland. Amjad misses the yorker and pushes it too full, drilled between the bowler and non-striker to the long-on boundary
length and outside off, Mooney wants to smash it away but does not connect
full and on the stumps, Mooney makes room and cracks a drive to the right of long-off. The fielder dives to his right and makes a smart stop
loopy full toss but wide outside off, past the tram line
yorker, right in the blockhole, jammed back to the bowler
slower ball on off from Amjad. Mooney waits on it, hits with the wind and launches it over deep midwicket. But its all too late
full and wide outside off, sliced away behind square on the off side. Hong Kong stun hosts Ireland. After winning 21 straight matches in the World T20 Qualifier, Ireland have lost two in a row
